scripts.build:dev: npm run type-check && vite build --mode development
scripts.precommit: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test:run
scripts.// Code Quality Agents: ğŸ› ï¸ Automated code quality improvement agents
scripts.quality-check: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run docs:validate
scripts.quality-check:strict: npm run type-check:strict && npm run lint:refactor && npm run test:coverage:enhanced && npm run docs:full-check
scripts.full-analysis: npm run refactor && npm run bug-detect && npm run auto-fix && npm run docs:full-check
scripts.dev:analyze: npm run full-analysis && npm run dev
scripts.build:analyze: npm run full-analysis && npm run build
scripts.commit: npm run precommit && git add . && git status
scripts.deploy:validate: npm run quality-check:strict && npm run docs:violations && npm run docs:pre-deploy
scripts.deploy:check: echo 'ğŸ” Manual deployment check required. Run: npm run deploy:validate && echo "Ready for deployment"'
scripts.deploy:ready: npm run deploy:validate && echo 'âœ… Ready for deployment - use DEPLOY command in commit message'
scripts.analyze:bundle: npm run build:dev && powershell -Command "if (Test-Path 'dist/assets/*.js') { Get-ChildItem 'dist/assets/*.js' | ForEach-Object { Write-Host ('Bundle: ' + $_.Name + ' - ' + (Get-Item $_.FullName).Length + ' bytes') } } else { Write-Host 'Bundle analysis complete' }"
scripts.analyze:accessibility: echo 'â™¿ Accessibility check: Manual review required - check WCAG 2.1 AA compliance'
scripts.analyze:performance: echo 'âš¡ Performance check: Run Lighthouse audit for detailed analysis'
scripts.// Code Cleanup Agent: ğŸ§¹ Remove unused files and redundant code
scripts.cleanup:imports: echo 'Removing unused imports...' && npm run lint:refactor:fix
scripts.cleanup:code: npm run cleanup:files && npm run cleanup:imports
scripts.// Architecture Improvement Agent: ğŸ—ï¸ Optimize folder structure and separation
scripts.// Code Beautification Agent: ğŸ’… Format code and improve readability
scripts.beautify:all: npm run beautify:code && npm run beautify:imports && npm run beautify:naming
scripts.check:indian-compliance: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'Checking Indian market compliance...'; $currency = (Get-ChildItem -Path 'src' -Recurse -File -Include '*.ts', '*.tsx' | Select-String 'â‚¹' | Measure-Object).Count; Write-Host '- Currency (â‚¹):' $currency; $dates = (Get-ChildItem -Path 'src' -Recurse -File -Include '*.ts', '*.tsx' | Select-String 'DD/MM/YYYY|formatIndianDate|dd/mm/yyyy' | Measure-Object).Count; Write-Host '- Indian dates:' $dates; $gst = (Get-ChildItem -Path 'src' -Recurse -File -Include '*.ts', '*.tsx' | Select-String 'GST|calculateGST|18%' | Measure-Object).Count; Write-Host '- GST calculations:' $gst"
scripts.check:mobile-responsive: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'Checking mobile responsiveness...'; $responsive = (Get-ChildItem -Path 'src' -Recurse -File -Include '*.ts', '*.tsx' | Select-String 'sm:|md:|lg:|xl:|grid-cols-|flex-col|mobile|responsive' | Measure-Object).Count; Write-Host '- Responsive breakpoints:' $responsive"
scripts.check:dark-mode: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'Checking dark mode support...'; $dark = (Get-ChildItem -Path 'src' -Recurse -File -Include '*.ts', '*.tsx' | Select-String 'dark:|theme|ThemeProvider|next-themes' | Measure-Object).Count; Write-Host '- Dark mode patterns:' $dark"
scripts.report:generate: npm run full-analysis && echo 'ğŸ“„ Reports generated in reports/ directory'
scripts.report:coverage: npm run test:coverage && echo 'ğŸ“Š Coverage report: coverage/index.html'
scripts.report:docs: npm run docs:full-check && echo 'ğŸ“š Documentation report: See console output above'
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist, coverage, logs, reports -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'Cleaned build artifacts'"
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules/.cache -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'Deep clean completed'"
scripts.db:dev: npm run supabase:start && npm run db:validate
scripts.db:dev:reset: npm run supabase:reset && npm run db:sync
scripts.db:prod-sync: npm run db:backup && npm run db:sync && npm run db:validate
scripts.db:full-setup: npm run supabase:start && npm run db:consolidate && npm run db:sync
